text: The 2025 NCAA Division I men's basketball tournament was a single-elimination college basketball tournament. There were 68 teams in it. The tournament is for National Collegiate Athletic Association (NCAA) Division I men's college basketball. The winner of it was the national champion for the 2024â€“25 college basketball season. The tournament started on March 18, 2025. It will end on April 7. The championship game finished with the Florida Gators winning by two points (65-63) over the Houston Cougars. This is the first time since 2008 that all one seeds have made the Final 4. ==Tournament bracket== ===South Regional - Atlanta, Georgia=== ===West Regional - San Francisco, California=== ===East Regional - Newark, New Jersey=== ===Midwest Regional - Indianapolis, Indiana=== ===Final Four===
title: 2025 NCAA Division I men's basketball tournament
